hero.text:
We think and design unique experiences
for tomorrow's innovative digital enterprise services.

dynamicText.github: Take a look at our work.

aboutBlock.title: Close to customers across
aboutBlock.desc: Founded in 1993, Lunatech is a software development consultancy. Lunatech employs around 100 people and operates from its headquarters in Rotterdam as well as offices in Paris.

about.title: Custom software systems for over
about.text: Lunatech provides innovative solutions for the creation and/or modernisation of your digital enterprise services through the following services.

firstBlock.title: Close to customers across
firstBlock.desc: Founded in 1993, Lunatech is a software development consultancy. Lunatech employs around 100 people and operates from its headquarters in Rotterdam as well as offices in Paris.

secondBlock.title: Customised products to meet your
secondBlock.desc:
Lunatech specialises in the design, development, deployment and ongoing operation of customised software solutions to complex challenges.

Each application is meticulously designed to meet the specific requirements of our customers.

visions.1: Our work is characterised by a deep commitment to quality, underpinned by a methodical approach to software development.
visions.2: At the heart of Lunatech's ethos is a penchant for simplicity and pragmatism.
visions.3: This conviction is rooted in the notion that truly effective software is both intuitive and robust, devoid of superfluous complexities.
visions.4: Such an approach not only serves to bolster the software's reliability, but also enhances its adaptability and maintainability.

expertise.title: Custom software systems for over
expertise.text: Lunatech provides innovative solutions for the creation and/or modernisation of your digital enterprise services through the following services.

strategicExpertise.title: Strategic Expertise
strategicExpertise.text: We help companies develop IT strategies that support their business goals.

softwareDefinedVehicle.title: Software Defined Vehicle
softwareDefinedVehicle.text: We help companies create smart, connected mobility solutions.

softwareProjectDelivery.title: Software Project Delivery
softwareProjectDelivery.text: We develop custom software to meet your specific needs.

systemIntegration.title: System Integration
systemIntegration.text: We integrate existing systems and third-party applications into your digital ecosystem.

legacyModernisation.title: Legacy Systems Modernisation
legacyModernisation.text: We modernise legacy systems to make them more secure, agile and efficient.

expertisesPage.title: Meet your needs with our
expertisesPage.text: We provide a wide range of expertises to help you meet your needs. We are experts in the following areas:

firstBlock.title: can help you with the following

technoPlanning.title: Technology planning
technoPlanning.text: Developing long-term IT strategies and roadmaps that support business goals.

riskManagement.title: Risk management
riskManagement.text: Identifying and mitigating IT-related risks, such as security threats and data breaches

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: Keeping abreast of emerging technologies and assessing their potential impact on the organization.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.text: Ensuring data is handled securely, compliantly, and used strategically.

changeManagement.title: Change Management
changeManagement.text: Implementing IT changes smoothly to minimize disruption.

digitalTransformation.title: Digital Transformation
digitalTransformation.text: Leading efforts to transform traditional processes with digital technologies.

secondBlock.title: can help you with the following
secondBlock.text: Lunatech provides innovative solutions for the creation and/or modernisation of your digital business services through the following services.

technologies.title: Our
technologies.carouselText: With 30 years' experience in IT consulting, we offer a range of technologies to meet your immediate needs and support your future growth.

automotive.title: Automotive
automotive.text: We help companies create smart, connected mobility solutions.

entertainment.title: Entertainment
entertainment.text: Developing interactive platforms to offer immersive entertainment experiences.

finance.title: Financial
finance.text: We help companies create smart, connected mobility solutions.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.text: Creating digital data management and analysis products for the insurance industry.

scala.title: Scala
scala.text: Scala’s blend of functional and object-oriented programming makes it ideal for developing complex, high-performance applications. Lunatech’s expertise in Scala ensures that we can deliver software solutions that are both powerful and maintainable, supporting your long-term business objectives.

java.title: Java
java.text: Java is a foundational language for enterprise-level software development. At Lunatech, we use Java to build robust, scalable, and secure applications that can be deployed across various platforms. Our deep expertise in Java allows us to deliver solutions that meet your business’s most demanding requirements.

kotlin.title: Kotlin
kotlin.text: Kotlin is a modern programming language that offers enhanced productivity, safety, and interoperability with Java. We use Kotlin to develop backend services, and full-stack solutions, providing you with modern, efficient, and high-quality software.

aws.title: AWS
aws.text: AWS is a comprehensive and widely adopted cloud platform that offers over 200 fully-featured services from data centers globally. We use AWS to build scalable, secure, and resilient applications that can handle your business's most demanding workloads. Our expertise ensures that your cloud infrastructure is optimized for performance, cost-efficiency, and security.

googlecloud.title: Google Cloud
googlecloud.text: Google Cloud provides powerful tools for data analytics, machine learning, and application deployment. Lunatech leverages these capabilities to create high-performance solutions that enable data-driven decision-making and foster innovation within your organization. Our deep knowledge of Google Cloud services ensures seamless integration with your existing infrastructure and operations.

azure.title: Azure
azure.text: As a leading cloud platform, Azure offers a broad range of services to support application development, data storage, and AI-driven insights. Our proficiency in Azure allows us to deliver tailored cloud solutions that enhance productivity, drive digital transformation, and scale with your business. We ensure that your applications are efficiently deployed and managed in the Azure environment, providing a robust foundation for your digital initiatives.

openshift.title: Openshift
openshift.text: Red Hat OpenShift is a powerful container orchestration platform based on Kubernetes, enabling the development, deployment, and management of containerized applications. At Lunatech, we use OpenShift to help businesses streamline their development processes, improve application portability, and achieve greater agility in their IT operations. Our expertise ensures that your containerized applications are scalable, secure, and easy to manage.

integration.title: Integration
integration.text: We help you to integrate your applications and data, whether they are on-premise or in the cloud, using the best open source technologies.

contact.subtitle: Contact
contact.title: Let's work
contact.text: Let us help you become even greater at what you do. Send us an email so we know more.

expertiseSoftwareDefinedVehicle.title: Defined Vehicle
expertiseSoftwareDefinedVehicle.text: A Software Defined Vehicle is any vehicle that manages its operations, adds functionality and enables new features primarily or entirely through software. Software Defined Vehicles are the next evolution of the automotive industry. Lunatech has been involved with Software Defined Vehicle since 2016 while the term did not exist yet. Lunatech, together with large automobile manufacturers has been involved in processing car data at a large scale and providing services for those vehicles. Lunatech specialises in cloud middleware and processing data for software-defined vehicles.

expertiseSoftwareProjectDelivery.title: Project Delivery
expertiseSoftwareProjectDelivery.text: Lunatech specializes in custom software development, offering tailored solutions to meet the specific needs of businesses and individuals. Their services encompass requirement analysis, design, development, testing, UX design, integration, deployment, training, maintenance, scalability, security, and managing cost and time considerations. This approach allows for addressing unique challenges and opportunities, ensuring that the software is efficient, secure and scalable while requiring careful planning and skilled teams for successful implementation.

expertiseSystemIntegration.title: System
expertiseSystemIntegration.text: Lunatech excels in system integration, enhancing organizational IT by connecting disparate systems to improve efficiency and technology utilization. Utilizing Web APIs, middleware, and cloud solutions, they focus on security, compliance, and integrating legacy and new technologies. This approach makes IT environments more sustainable, agile, and cost-effective, driving better decision-making and customer experiences.

expertiseLegacyModernisation.title: Legacy
expertiseLegacyModernisation.text: Lunatech's Legacy Modernisation Service modernizes outdated technology systems to align with current business needs and technology standards. This comprehensive service includes assessment and reverse engineering, business alignment, technology stack upgrade, data migration, system integration, UI modernisation, testing, security enhancements, training and change management. Aimed at improving efficiency, compatibility and security. Lunatech adopts a phased or incremental approach to minimize disruption, ensuring a smooth transition to modern, agile systems that support organizational objectives effectively. Additionally, Lunatech ensures knowledge transfer and training for clients' teams, enabling them to manage the modernized application independently. This comprehensive approach helps businesses maximize their software investments without the need for costly redevelopment over multiple years.

expertiseStrategicExpertise.title: Strategic
expertiseStrategicExpertise.text:

vla bla

partners.title: Our
partners.subtitle: Partners
partners.text: At Lunatech, we recognize the value of strategic alliances and collaboration in driving innovation and delivering top-notch solutions. Our partnerships with industry-leading technology providers and open-source communities enable us to leverage cutting-edge technologies and offer comprehensive, tailored solutions to meet our clients' diverse needs. Discover our key partnerships below.

opensource.title: Open
opensource.text:
Lunatech plays a significant role in the open-source community, demonstrating a growing commitment to this initiative. Its active participation in Quarkus, Conferencess, as well as its contribution to the Dotty directory, testify to its strong interest in the development and promotion of open-source technologies. This involvement not only underlines Lunatech's expertise in emerging technologies, but also contributes to enriching the open-source ecosystem, fostering knowledge sharing and collaborative innovation. Lunatech can help you with your open source strategy and connect the open source softwares within your organisation. Lunatech open-source contributions are a significant part of their culture and approach to software development. They regularly develop and release open-source tools, libraries, and frameworks that address common challenges in software engineering and system integration. These contributions not only support their own projects but also help other developers and organizations tackle similar issues. Some of the areas where Lunatech contributes include:


Open-Source Libraries and Frameworks: Lunatech develops and maintains a variety of open-source libraries and frameworks that are used by developers around the world. These tools often focus on areas like web development, data processing, system integration, and DevOps, providing robust, well-documented solutions that can be easily integrated into other projects.


Community Engagement: Lunatech encourages its developers to actively participate in open-source projects outside of the company's initiatives. This includes contributing code to existing projects, offering bug fixes, adding new features, and helping with project maintenance. Our team members often engage with the community through forums, GitHub repositories, and mailing lists, where they share knowledge and collaborate with other developers.


Open-Source Events and Sponsorship: Lunatech supports and sponsors open-source conferences, hackathons, and workshops. These events are opportunities for developers to come together, learn from each other, and collaborate on open-source projects. By sponsoring and participating in these events, Lunatech helps to foster a vibrant and collaborative open-source community.


Educational Resources: Lunatech also contributes to the open-source ecosystem by creating and sharing educational content, such as tutorials, blog posts, and documentation. These resources are designed to help other developers learn how to use open-source tools effectively, and they often include examples of how Lunatech has used these tools in real-world projects.


Internal Projects Released as Open Source: Many of Lunatech’s internal projects, developed to solve specific problems they encountered in their work, are eventually released as open-source software. This approach not only showcases their technical expertise but also allows other organizations to benefit from their innovations.

Commitment to Open-Source Principles: Lunatech’s involvement in open source reflects a broader commitment to the principles of transparency, collaboration, and community-driven development. By contributing to open-source projects, they help to drive the collective progress of the software industry, ensuring that valuable tools and technologies are available to all.

Through these activities, Lunatech not only enhances its own technological capabilities but also contributes to the broader software development community, helping to push the boundaries of what is possible with open-source software.

Lunatech is also involved and part of the following organisations:

Eclipse Foundation The Eclipse Foundation is a non-profit organization that supports and governs a diverse range of open-source software projects, most notably the Eclipse IDE. Established in 2004, it fosters collaborative development by providing the infrastructure and governance necessary for high-quality open-source projects. The Foundation’s mission includes driving innovation, integrating software tools, and growing a vibrant ecosystem through its well-defined governance structure, diverse membership, and active community involvement. It hosts significant projects like Eclipse Che and Eclipse Vert.x, and organizes events such as EclipseCon to promote its technologies and facilitate collaboration. SDV Eclipse We are a member of the Eclipse Software Defined Vehicle (Eclipse SDV) working group, an open technology platform dedicated to the enhancement and development of software-defined vehicle technologies. As an active member of the Eclipse SDV group, we work closely with other industry players to drive innovation and adoption of open standards in the area of software-defined vehicles. This collaboration enables us to stay at the forefront of the latest technological advances and actively contribute to shaping the future of the automobile. EOS Consortium EOS consortium is shaping a resilient, open and collaborative digital landscape to ensure Europe's leadership in global innovation. Together, best-in-class companies build Europe's digital future, shaping a continent where organizations achieve digital sovereignty, break free from proprietary technology dependencies, foster innovation, and strengthen local economies. Scala ecosystem Lunatech has actively contributed to the Scala ecosystem by developing and maintaining libraries, enhancing popular frameworks like Akka and Play, and engaging with the Scala community through conferences and educational resources. They have supported open-source projects and provided valuable insights and improvements to Scala-related technologies. Additionally, Lunatech was a member of the Scala Center, an organization dedicated to supporting and advancing the Scala programming language and its ecosystem. Quarkus Lunatech contributes to Quarkus by enhancing the framework's functionality, improving its integration capabilities, and addressing various issues to ensure a robust and efficient development experience. Their work includes contributing code, providing bug fixes, and developing features that align with Quarkus's goals of optimizing Java applications for Kubernetes and cloud-native environments. Lunatech's involvement supports the framework's growth and adoption, helping to advance its capabilities and support for modern, scalable, and performant applications. Play Framework Contribution: Lunatech has made significant contributions to the Play Framework, a popular reactive web framework for Java and Scala, by enhancing its core functionality and extending its capabilities. Their involvement includes developing new features, fixing bugs, and improving integration with other technologies, which helps maintain Play Framework’s position as a leading choice for building scalable and high-performance web applications. By actively participating in the Play community and providing valuable feedback, Lunatech supports the framework’s evolution and ensures that it continues to meet the needs of modern developers, contributing to a more robust and efficient tool for creating dynamic web applications. Akka Contribution: Lunatech has been a proactive contributor to Akka, the powerful toolkit for building concurrent, distributed, and resilient applications on the JVM. Their contributions include enhancements to Akka’s core libraries, performance optimizations, and support for new features, which help improve the framework’s functionality and scalability. By engaging with the Akka community and addressing key challenges, Lunatech helps advance the toolkit’s capabilities and ensures it remains a reliable and cutting-edge solution for developers building complex, distributed systems. Their ongoing involvement underscores their commitment to supporting and evolving essential open-source technologies in the realm of concurrent and distributed computing. Lunatech demonstrates its commitment to open source through active contributions to a diverse array of high-impact projects, including Scala, Akka, Play Framework, and Quarkus. By developing and maintaining libraries, enhancing frameworks, and participating in key open-source communities, Lunatech not only improves the functionality and usability of these technologies but also fosters innovation and collaboration within the open-source ecosystem. Their engagement extends to supporting and advocating for open-source practices, sharing expertise through educational resources, and contributing to the advancement of cutting-edge tools and solutions. This dedication highlights Lunatech’s role as a vital supporter of open-source software, driving progress and enabling the broader community to benefit from their technical expertise and collaborative spirit.
